text.en: To beings drowning in saṃsāra’s terrifying ocean,
text.en-trans: jikrung khor tsor jingwé drowa la

text.en: You manifest as the master of non-referential compassion,
text.en-trans: mikmé nyingjé wang gyur trulpé gar

text.en: Guide on the path of excellent teachings, Sun of Speech,
text.en-trans: ten dzé lekpé lam tön mawé nyi

text.en: Lama Avalokiteśvara, to you I pray!
May you always remain on my crown without ever separating.
text.en-trans: dralmé tsuk gi gyen du tobpa dang

text.en: Bless me so that, practising the true meaning of your speech correctly,
text.en-trans: dé sung dam dön manor nyam lang né

text.en: I may establish the roots of everlasting bliss and happiness!
text.en-trans: ten dé tsawa tsukpar jingyi lob
